scriptLines:
query: 'SELECT SOURCE_KEY,WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,WS_EXT_PH_NAME,LAST_NAME,
CASE WHEN CHARINDEX(' ',FIRST_NAME) > 0 THEN trim(SUBSTRING(FIRST_NAME,1,CHARINDEX(' ',FIRST_NAME))) ELSE FIRST_NAME END AS FIRST_NAME,
CASE WHEN CHARINDEX(' ',FIRST_NAME) > 0 THEN trim(SUBSTRING(FIRST_NAME,CHARINDEX(' ',FIRST_NAME),LEN(FIRST_NAME))) ELSE NULL END AS MIDDLE_NAME,
WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE,WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,WS_EXT_PH_CITY,WS_EXT_PH_STATE,WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,ZIP_CODE5,WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION,CHANGE_CODE,
COUNTRY_CODE,WS_EXT_PH_STAT,PERSON_CHECK_SUM,PERADDR_CHECK_SUM,PERSONIDENT_CHECK_SUM
FROM (
SELECT A.SOURCE_KEY,A.WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_NAME) WS_EXT_PH_NAME, 
CASE WHEN A.ws_ext_ph_name like '%,%' THEN UPPER(trim(SUBSTRING(A.ws_ext_ph_name,1,(CHARINDEX(',',A.ws_ext_ph_name)-1))))
ELSE UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_NAME) END AS LAST_NAME,
CASE WHEN A.ws_ext_ph_name like '%,%' THEN UPPER(trim(SUBSTRING(A.ws_ext_ph_name,CHARINDEX(',',A.ws_ext_ph_name)+1,LEN(A.ws_ext_ph_name)))) 
ELSE NULL END AS FIRST_NAME,
CAST(A.WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE as date) as WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE,UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1) WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2) WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3) WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,
UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_CITY) WS_EXT_PH_CITY,CASE WHEN UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_STATE)='US' THEN NULL ELSE UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_STATE) END WS_EXT_PH_STATE ,
A.WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,SUBSTRING(A.WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,1,5) ZIP_CODE5,UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION) WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION,UPPER(A.CHANGE_CODE) CHANGE_CODE,UPPER(B.COUNTRY_CODE) COUNTRY_CODE,UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_STAT) WS_EXT_PH_STAT,
CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes('MD5',ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_NAME,'1')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,'2')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE,'3')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,'4')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,'5')+
ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,'6')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_CITY,'7')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_STATE,'8')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,'9')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_STAT,'10') Â  Â ),2) PERSON_CHECK_SUM,
CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes('MD5',ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,'4')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,'5')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,'6')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_CITY,'7')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_STATE,'8')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,'9')),2) PERADDR_CHECK_SUM,
CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes('MD5',ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,'2')),2) PERSONIDENT_CHECK_SUM
FROM CMDM_STAGE.RS_OMNI_VIPS_DAILY_PART_HEADER_DELTA_STG A LEFT JOIN 
CMDM_STAGE.STATE_MASTER B ON UPPER(TRIM(A.WS_EXT_PH_STATE)) = UPPER(TRIM(B.STATE_CODE))
) T',
